title: If no one asks the same question, are you original in thought? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. Probably, but I’ve seen a lot of “original” questions on here that were terrible questions. So there’s more to it than that. Plus, this is just one forum . . . who knows for sure what questions are being asked on all of them?
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Chad T. Krohn
